text: Invictus is a 2009 biographical sports drama movie. It was directed by Clint Eastwood and stars Morgan Freeman and Matt Damon. Movie critic Roger Ebert gave the movie 3Â½ stars out of 4. The movie was about South African president Nelson Mandela during the 1995 Rugby World Cup. It was released on December 11, 2009. Freeman and Damon both received Academy Award nominations for their role in the movie. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:2000s biographical movies Category:2009 drama movies Category:2000s sports drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:South African biographical movies Category:South African drama movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about Nelson Mandela Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Movies set in the 1990s Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood
title: Invictus (movie)
